flawed_nl_solution:
Rock and Roll CDs will be 5*4 = <<5*4=20>>20 dollars.
Pop CDs will be 10*4 = <<10*4=40>>40 dollars.
Dance CDs will be 3*4 = <<3*4=12>>12 dollars.
Country CDs will be 7*4 = <<7*4=82>>82 dollars.
In total Julia would need 20+40+12+82 = <<20+40+12+82=154>>154 dollars.
Julia is short 154-75 = <<154-75=79>>79 dollars.
#### 79

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 82. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
